title: James Burnett (rugby union)
text:
James Burnett (born 12 July 1947) is a former <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a> international <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
Rugby Union career.
Amateur career.
Burnett played for <a href="Heriot%27s%20Rugby%20Club">Heriot's</a>.
Provincial career.
He played for <a href="Edinburgh%20District%20%28rugby%20union%29">Edinburgh District</a>.
International career.
He received 3 <a href="Scotland%20B%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland 'B'</a> caps between 1978 and 1980.
He went on to play for <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a> 4 times, all in 1980.
Dental career.
He became a dentist.
